title: Thursday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
ALT★HERO: Q Episode 28: Evil is Everywhere

VEGFOLK FABLES Episode 2: Love for the Narrative

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: ADVENTURE Pitfall 1: On the Waterfront

A THRONE OF BONES Episode 22: A Bad Time to be a Goblin

STONETOSS Episode 32: Life Imitates Art

Readers may wish to note that episode 22 of A THRONE OF BONES marks the shift in the series from the novel to the short story that appeared in SUMMA ELVETICA, “The Hoblets of Wiccam Fensboro”. Also, if you haven’t checked out the new VEGFOLK FABLES series, you really should. It’s both well-illustrated and very funny.

UPDATE: If you’re on Instagram, be sure to follow the new Arkhaven Comics account there:
